original_title: Kuwaiti leader Sheikh Nawaf al-Ahmed dies aged 86
original_body_lines: Kuwait’s leader Sheikh Emir Nawaf al-Ahmad al-Jaber al-Sabah has died at the age of 86, Kuwaiti state TV announced.
The sheikh had led the oil-rich nation for the last three years after taking over from his half-brother, Sheikh Sabah al-Ahmed al-Sabah.
“With great sadness and sorrow, we mourn... the death of Sheikh Nawaf al-Ahmad al-Sabah” a statement aired on state TV said.
Regular programming on the channel has been cut following the announcement.
